title: Help me please.. my account.. why is it still banned ...
body: Hi, my account Yeung Zeus was banned not too long ago and the message reads "This account has been suspended until September 02, 2016. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details."... My email doesnt have anything in it from RIOT games .. I'm so confused... What am I suppose to do.. help me please .... please ...

replies.body: You do have the email. Chances are you put it on a throwaway account and forgot the password.

> Yeah... dont have that email though .. but thank you anyway..

What?!?  You had to have an e-mail to get an account right??

Your account becomes available the exact moment it was ban, So if it was ban at 11:59pm it will be unban at that time. The email is the best guess as to when the account was ban so go by that. Either that or just wait it out till tomorrow!
Yeah... dont have that email though .. but thank you anyway..

> [{quoted}](name=Yeung Zeus,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=e8WhBrMc,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-09-02T19:36:38.452+0000)
>
> Yeah... dont have that email though .. but thank you anyway..

sadly you are just going to have to wait!
